meta.title: TierWise | Exclusive Early Access
meta.description: Exclusive early access to TierWise - The ultimate platform for optimizing AI product pricing.
meta.keywords: AI pricing calculator, SaaS pricing strategy, AI cost calculator, pricing tiers, profit margin calculator, AI business tools

hero.title: Exclusive Early Access
hero.subtitle: Be one of the first to optimize your AI product pricing with our specialized platform.
hero.successMessage: Thank you! You'll receive exclusive updates soon.

exclusivePricing.title: Exclusive Pricing
exclusivePricing.description: Secure special pricing conditions as a founding member.

prioritySupport.title: Priority Support
prioritySupport.description: Receive dedicated support and personalized onboarding.

influenceProduct.title: Influence the Product
influenceProduct.description: Help shape the future of the platform with your feedback.

features.title: Exclusive features for your pricing strategy

aiCostCalculator.title: AI Cost Calculator
aiCostCalculator.description: Access to over 250 pre-configured AI models with costs updated weekly.

whatIfSimulator.title: "What If" Simulator
whatIfSimulator.description: Test different pricing scenarios and see the direct impact on your profit margin and revenue.

tierManager.title: Tier Manager
tierManager.description: Create and manage multiple pricing tiers with customized resource allocations per user.

competitiveAnalysis.title: Competitive Analysis
competitiveAnalysis.description: Market price benchmarking to position your product competitively in the AI space.

priceAlerts.title: Price Alerts
priceAlerts.description: Receive notifications when AI provider prices change, keeping your calculations up-to-date.

financialProjections.title: Financial Projections
financialProjections.description: Visualize revenue and profit projections based on different growth rates and scenarios.

aiStartups.title: AI Startups
aiStartups.description: Early-stage companies that need to define their pricing strategy for AI-based products, maximizing margins from the start.

saasCompanies.title: SaaS Companies
saasCompanies.description: Businesses that are incorporating AI features into their existing products and need to adjust their pricing strategy to reflect the added value.

developmentAgencies.title: Development Agencies
developmentAgencies.description: Teams that create customized solutions with AI and need a reliable way to calculate costs and set prices for their clients.

businessConsultants.title: Business Consultants
businessConsultants.description: Professionals specialized in technology and digital transformation who help companies optimize their pricing strategies for AI products.

cta.title: Ready to optimize your pricing strategy?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of founders who are maximizing their margins with strategic pricing for AI products.
cta.limitedSpots: Limited spots available for the early access program
